content.rendered:
[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”middle” css=”.vc_custom_1633887371170{margin-top: 150px !important;padding-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;background-color: #f9f9f9 !important;}” el_class=”timeLimit”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1612774504803{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”]

This will be the platform you will be trading on!

Select your Preferred Trading Platform

[vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=”left-im” width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”7992″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][vc_single_image image=”7981″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” el_class=”right-mc”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1679597170841{margin-top: 25px !important;margin-bottom: 10px !important;}”]

SELECT TraderEvolution

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1679597186297{margin-bottom: 25px !important;}”]

SELECT TE – Islamic

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”7910″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1680088027371{margin-top: 20px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;}”]

Get a 10% Discount

For the next few weeks, TradingView cannot be used to place trades with. You can still chart on TradingView, but you’ll have to use the TradingEvolution platform to enter trades. Hence, the exceptional, time-limited discount.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1679597205131{margin-bottom: 10px !important;}”]

SELECT TradingView

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1679597222253{margin-bottom: 25px !important;}”]

SELECT TV – Islamic

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=”left-im” width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”7990″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][vc_single_image image=”7982″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” el_class=”right-mc”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1679597246697{margin-top: 25px !important;margin-bottom: 10px !important;}”]

SELECT MT4

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1681066339191{margin-bottom: 50px !important;}”]Please note:

  • Islamic accounts have higher commissions and somewhat larger spreads, so to enable us to offer Sharia-compliant accounts.
  • The TradingView mobile app is only for “papertrading”, and cannot be used for real trading at the moment. This functionality is coming, but we have no date for roll-out.
    Meanwhile, to check your TradingView account, or trade on your mobile device, you can use the TraderEvolution app.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
